E-Mail Messages
Date: Sunday, 4/27/1989
Subject: Buck Showalter learns new position
Buck Showalter has made noteable progress
learning his new position, Second Base.
I would rate his skills as "E" right now.

Regards,
Your scouting director



Date: Thursday, 5/15/1989
Subject: Progress of Mike Mohler
Dear Sir,
Mike Mohler has nothing more to prove at A Port Charlotte Rangers!
He has an ERA of 3.00 over there, so I think
a promotion wouldn't hurt.

Regards,
Scouting Director



Date: Monday, 5/19/1989
Subject: Contract
Dear Sir,
I would like to negotiate a contract extension!
Please let me know if you are interested!

Regards,
Jesse Barfield



Date: Tuesday, 5/20/1989
Subject: Contract extension question
Dear Sir,
My contract expires after this season.
I would like to resign, so please let's talk!

Regards,
Juan Berenguer



Date: Thursday, 5/22/1989
Subject: Extension?
Hello Sir,
Are you interested in negotiating a contract extension?
You know, I'm in my final year. I'd like to stay here!

Sincerely,
Gene Klutts
